description:
When the forecast call for a little of everything, the Lone Mountain 3-in-1 is straightforward solution. By itself, the waterproof-breathable H2No® shell shrugs off showers and blocks rude winds. Add the nicely insulated inner layer when you need core warmth for mountain or town weather. It's insulated with a soft, efficient layer of THERMOLITE® polyester and lined in fleece through the body, with smooth taffeta in the arms.External layer attaches to insulated layer via solid zippers and snaps at the cuffs and collar.H2No Performance Standard 2-layer waterproof breathable outer shell with DWR finish and fully welded seams.Shell hood and sleeves are lined in polyester taffeta to slide easily over layers.Hood has 2-way adjustments.Fully welded seams keep the promise of waterproofness.Shell has an exterior storm flap, interior wind-flap closure and zip-through collar with microfleece-lined chin flap and collar.Inner jacket uses recycled polyester (70% recycled) and is lined with smooth polyester fleece (70% recycled); sleeves are lined with recycled polyester taffeta.Diamond quilt pattern secures 60g ThermoLite polyester (92% recycled) in body and 80g ThermoLite polyester insulation in the sleeves.Shell has one headphone compatible chest pocket, and 2 hand pockets.Zip-out jacket has 2 handwarmer pockets lined with micro-polyester brushed jersey.Snap closes at wrists.Shell has an adjustable hem for maximum weather protection.Hip length.
